/* LoginMapper.getLoginInfo2 */
SELECT MBR_ID as mbrId , MBR_NM as mbrNm , TEL as tel , ROLE_CD as roleCd , LOGIN_END_DT as loginEndDt , USE_YN as useYn , LOGIN_FAIL_CNT as loginFailCnt , TO_CHAR(LOGIN_FAIL_DT,'YYYYMMddHH24mi') AS loginFailDt , APPLY_DT as applyDt , MBR_PW as mbrPw , DECODE(MBR_ID,'admin','Y','N') as managerYn FROM TB_MBR_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND MBR_ID = #{mbrId} -- AND use_yn = 'Y'

/* LoginMapper.getCommonMenuList */
SELECT MENU_ID AS menuId ,MENU_NM AS menuName FROM TB_MENU_MST WHERE 1=1 AND DEPTH = '1' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MENU_ID IN ( SELECT A.UPMENU_ID FROM ( SELECT A.UPMENU_ID , COUNT(A.UPMENU_ID) AS CNT FROM TB_MENU_MST A JOIN TB_ROLE_MENU B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID WHERE A.DEPTH = '2' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.ROLE_CD = (SELECT ROLE_CD FROM TB_MBR_INFO WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId}) GROUP BY A.UPMENU_ID HAVING COUNT(A.UPMENU_ID) > 0 ) A ) ORDER BY MENU_ID

/* LoginMapper.getSubMenuList2 */
SELECT C.UPMENU_ID AS upMenuID ,C.MENU_ID AS menuId ,C.MENU_NM AS menuName ,C.MENU_URL AS menuURL FROM TB_ROLE_MST A LEFT JOIN TB_ROLE_MENU B ON A.ROLE_CODE=B.ROLE_CD LEFT JOIN TB_MENU_MST C ON B.MENU_ID=C.MENU_ID WHERE A.ROLE_CODE=( SELECT ROLE_CD FROM TB_MBR_INFO WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.ORD_NO

/* LoginMapper.getAllSubMenuList */
SELECT UPMENU_ID AS upMenuID ,MENU_ID AS menuId ,MENU_NM AS menuName ,MENU_URL AS menuURL FROM TB_MENU_MST WHERE 1=1 AND DEPTH = '2' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* LoginMapper.getLoginInfoOnlyId */
SELECT USE_YN as useYn , LOGIN_FAIL_CNT as loginFailCnt , TO_CHAR(LOGIN_FAIL_DT,'YYYYMMddHH24mi') AS loginFailDt FROM TB_MBR_INFO A WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_ID = #{mbrId}
